name: Raccapult
description:
Game aims to reach the longest distance by shooting available raccoons using a catapult. By pressing the power button players can control trajectory of possible flying. After each shoot players will lose one raccoon and moreover the subsequent available raccoons have to land in the area close to the campfire. Raccoons landed outside of the area freeze.  :-(

The last two Raccoons indicate the last shoot, after which the total flight distance will be counted.
